jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well. My name is Anuradha, and I represent Talent Group, a staff augmentation firm providing a wide-range of talent on-demand and total workforce solutions. We have excellent domain expertise in all verticals. Repositioning professionals is what we do, and we do it very well. Please look at the job description below and let me know your interest. Job Title: Business Analyst (Performance Measurement & Attribution) Location: Quincy, MA (Hybrid) Contract Job Description: Investment Performance Measurement domain knowledge; Business Analyst or Product roles, fairly standard set of skills - accounting data ingestion, calculations, reporting etc. if possible with existing STT PnA / FLX / GPA experience. Apply functional business knowledge when building platform requirements Ability to perform gap analysis between source of data and existing data model to determine model additions Effective communicator – can summarize succinctly and can provide details when needed. Team oriented – capable of working in a global setting. Detail oriented and strong sense of responsibility. Flexible and can adapt easily to changing/evolving role requirements Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
